      • BasketBall

        public BasketBall(int x,
                  int y,
                  int r,
                  Player player,
                  Net net)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of basketball center location
        y - y coordinate of basketball center location
        r - radius of basketball in pixels
        player - player that basketball interacts with
        net - net that basketball in shot into

      • toss

        public void toss(double angle,
                 int level)
        shoots basketball that is being held at an angle
        Parameters:
        angle - angle in radians from positive x-axis that basketball is shot at (0<=angle<=pi/2)
        level - power of toss
